hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar: On the day of `Id-ul-Fitr and `Id-ul-Adha a spear used to be planted in front of the Prophet (as a Sutra for the prayer) and then he would pray

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الْحَرْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: As-Salat using a small spear as a Sutra
